biotools.summary: BICORN (Bayesian Inference of Cooperative Regulatory Network) builds a hierarchical Bayesian model and infers context-specific cis-regulatory modules based on transcription factor-gene binding events and gene expression data for a particular cell type. BICORN automatically searches for a list of candidate CRMs based on the input transcription factor bindings at regulatory regions associated with genes of interest. Applying Gibbs sampling, BICORN iteratively estimates model parameters of CRMs, transcription factor activities, and corresponding regulation on gene transcription, which it models as a sparse network of functional cis-regulatory modules regulating target genes.
